turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you order me pizzas from Dominos?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Dominos on Division Street please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! How many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three of the same pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pacific Veggie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a 13 inch?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They don't have that size, but you can get a 12 inch or a 14 inch.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh I would like a 14 inch then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of crust do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hand tossed please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What sauce do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What tomato sauces do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have Robust Inspired or Heavy Marinara.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want Robust Inspired.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How much sauce do you want on the pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the normal amount.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How much cheese do you want on the pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want extra please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the halfs to be different?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I want both halves to be the same thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The standard Pacific Veggie comes with onions, diced tomatoes, black olives, mushrooms, shredded provolone cheese, spinach, roasted red peppers and feta cheese. Do you want any of those to be removed?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No keep them all please but add garlic.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! Do you want all of the toppings to be normal amounts?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please and add one side of garlic twists.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! Your order is for 3 14 inch Pacific Veggie pizzas with one side of garlic twists is 76 dollars and 72 cents. Is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! Your order has been placed and will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes. The receipt will be sent to your phone.
